title: Best programming language for CP
details: There are hundreds of programming language. Every language has its own pros and cons; has special features. But if we talk about CP(competitive programming), C++ will be the first choice. It helps to design efficient codes. Besides, STL is the most attractive feature of C++.

title: Leetcode - Get prepared for your next Coding Interview
details: Letcode is one of the best problem-solving site. If you want to make yourself prepared for your next coding interview, leetcode is for you.
